definition: to take the best/to absorb the essence
to take/to get/to choose/to fetch
his/her/its/their/that/such/it (refers to sth preceding it)
essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
magnificent/splendid/flowery

take the cream, discard the dross (political and educational slogan)/keep what is good, discard the rest/You need to be selective when studying./In modernizing the country, don't accept uncritically all foreign ideas.
pinyin: qu3 qi2 jing1 hua2 , qu4 qi2 zao1 po4

sentences.english: Therefore, Keep its essence and discard its dross in the course of the study.
sentences.chinese: 对《颜氏家训》研究要取其精华，去其糟粕。

sentences.english: Some interview content very expatiatory , how to take its flower, go its scum?
sentences.chinese: 有些采访内容十分冗长，如何取其精华，去其糟粕呢？

sentences.english: What we should make sure is to absorb the essence and discard the dregs.
sentences.chinese: 我们要做到的是取其精华，弃其糟粕。

sentences.english: For those works, we might discard the dross and select the essence as well.
sentences.chinese: 对于这样的作品，我们不妨取其精华，去其糟粕。

sentences.english: You don't have to live in a great city your whole life to benefit from it.
sentences.chinese: 你不必在一个伟大城市终老就可撷取其精华。
